item.title: 13 Disney Animation Characters With Surprisingly Large Kill Counts
item.description: Disney animated movies are often seen as sweet family-friendly classics, but some characters have shocking kill counts, and not just the villains.

item.title: Bendy And The Ink Machine Movie: Everything We Know About The Video Game Adaptation
item.description: The hit indie video game Bendy and the Ink Machine is being brought to life on the big screen and there are exciting updates about the adaptation.

item.title: Cellar Door's Jordana Brewster Talks Engaging Thriller, The Fun Of Working With Scott Speedman And Fast & Furious 11
item.description: Cellar Door star Jordana Brewster breaks down the engaging thriller, why she loved working with Scott Speedman and a Fast & Furious 11 update.
